sentences: Delegates reconvened just before 1:00 am on Sunday morning and approved the revised draft SPM (8th WG III/Doc.
Delegates also approved the Adjustments to the Technical Summary and Chapters for consistency with the approved SPM (8th WG III/Doc.
2c), and the underlying scientific/technical assessment in the Special Report (8th WG III/Doc.
WG III agreed to pass on its best wishes to the family of the late Dr David Pearce.
